title: AI in Precision Agriculture
problem_statement: Farmers face declining yields due to climate variability and resource constraints. AI-driven precision agriculture offers tools to optimize productivity and sustainability.
key_questions: How can AI improve crop yield prediction?
What role do sensors and drones play in real-time monitoring?
What barriers exist for smallholder farmer adoption?
method_brief: Field survey with farmers using digital tools
Data collection from IoT devices and drones
